text: Great Britain competed at the 1973 World Aquatics Championships in Belgrade, Yugoslavia from August 31 to September 9. ==Diving== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%;" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Preliminaries !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Points !Rank !Points !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Trevor Simpson |align=left rowspan=2|Men's springboard |470.04 |12 |colspan=2 rowspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Chris Valls |437.40 |16 |-align=center |align=left|Martyn Brown |align=left rowspan=2|Men's platform |413.28 |16 |colspan=2 rowspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Frank Dufficy |326.88 |21 |-align=center |align=left|Alison Drake |align=left rowspan=2|Women's springboard |392.94 |6 Q |403.50 |5 |-align=center |align=left rowspan=2|Helen Koppell |351.21 |14 |colspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left rowspan=2|Women's platform |302.04 |14 |colspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Beverly Williams |324.87 |12 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== World Aquatics Championships 1973 Category:Nations at the 1973 World Aquatics Championships
title: Great Britain at the 1973 World Aquatics Championships
